groups.name: Build
groups.description: Endpoints used for building or creating new virtual machines

groups.name: Power Functions
groups.description: Endpoints for performing power functions (i.e. start, stop etc...) on a virtual machine

groups.name: Console
groups.description: Endpoints for managing console access to a virtual machine

groups.name: DNS Records
groups.description: Endpoints for managing DNS records beloning to existing DNS zones/domains

value.name: API Token Authenticator
value.description: Authenticates requests using an API token provided in the Authorization header
No API token was provided in the Authorization header. Ensure a token is provided prefixed with Bearer
The API token provided was not valid (it may not exist or have expired)

value.name: List data centers
value.description: Provides a full list of all data centers

value.name: Get data center
value.description: Provide details for a specific data center

value.name: Data Center Lookup
value.description: Provides for data centers to be looked up

spec.spec: id, name, sub_domain, personal, created_at, suspended

value.name: List virtual machines
value.description: Returns a list of all virtual machines for a given organization

value.description: Provides information about how data has been paginated

fields.name: total
fields.description: The total number of items across all pages

fields.description: The number of items per page

fields.name: large_set
fields.description: Is this a large set and therefore the total number of records cannot be returned?

value.name: Get virtual machine
value.description: Return information about a virtual machine

value.name: VirtualMachine Lookup
value.description: Provides for virtual machines to be looked up
The object found is in the trash and therefore cannot be manipulated through the API. It should be restored in order to run this operation.
No virtual machine was found matching any of the criteria provided in the arguments

value.name: Build virtual machine
value.description: Builds a new virtual machine based on the arguments provided to this endpoint.Virtual machines will be built in the background. This task will return an taskobject that will allow you to monitor the build process using the appropriate APIaction. This action only offers a small subset of the full functionality needed whenprovisioning virtual machines - see the `build_from_spec` action for a full advancedvirtual machine creation method.

value.description: Provides for zones to be looked up
No zone was found matching any of the criteria provided in the arguments

value.description: Provides for virtual machine packages to be looked up
No package was found matching any of the criteria provided in the arguments

value.name: Disk Template Lookup
value.description: Provides for disk templates to be looked up

value.description: Provides for networks to be looked up

fields.description: Additional information regarding the reason why permission was denied

value.description: A zone or a data_center argument must be provided

value.name: Build virtual machine (from spec)
value.description: Builds a new virtual machine by receiving a virtual machine spec document
The spec XML provided is invalid

value.name: Start virtual machine
value.description: Queues a task to start a virtual machine
This error means that a background task that was needed to complete your request could not be queued

value.name: Stop virtual machine
value.description: Queues a task to stop a virtual machine

value.name: Shutdown virtual machine
value.description: Queues a task to shutdown a virtual machine

value.name: Reset virtual machine
value.description: Queues a task to reset a virtual machine

value.name: Create console session
value.description: Creates a new console session which can be opened in a browser
Virtual machines must be in a started state to create console sessions

value.name: Delete virtual machine
value.description: Moves an existing virtual machine to the trash

value.name: Change package
value.description: Change a package for a virtual machine
